snippet.title: Evercade - Alwa's Awakening Cathedral Trailer - Two incredible Modern Retro Indie Games!
snippet.description:
Our next collection is here and it's a dual cart featuring two incredible modern retro indie games! 

Presenting Alwa's Awakening 8-Bit Edition and Cathedral on a single collection for the first time.

The retro inspired platformer from Elden Pixels comes here in its 8-bit conversion with over 10 hours of gameplay.

Cathedral has been completely ported to Evercade by Decemberborn and is our first Native game to be released on a cartridge, which means it's not emulated!

Available in October 2022 and available to pre-order from July 29th.
Find out more: https://evercade.co.uk/alwas-awakening-cathedral-evercade/
